examples.example: 他在国外完成学业后，毅然决定回国为祖国的发展贡献自己的力量。

translate.english: After completing his studies abroad, he resolutely decided to return to the motherland to contribute his own strength to the development of the motherland.

examples.example: 他在国外积累了丰富经验后，满怀憧憬地回国开启新的事业征程。

translate.english: After accumulating rich experience abroad, he returned to the country full of longing to start a new career journey.

examples.example: 小明在国外工作多年后，终于带着满满的收获回国与家人团聚。

translate.english: After working abroad for many years, Xiaoming finally returned to his country to reunite with his family with full harvest.
